column1: Local Foods////I love this place. I went two times in one weekend.   One location for lunch and the Kirby location to pickup a piece of that butterscotch brownie.  Oooooh so good.  I must say the Kirby location is more spacious
column2: but both are very nice and great for people watching.  Considering bringing my friend here for lunch this Sunday.  I've had the Roasted Shortrib sandwich
column3: which is soooo yummy.   And I had some of my daughter's Smoke Salmon sandwich
column4: really good too.  I was quite impressed with the Vegan Potato Salad
column5: but I'm not a fan of the Housemade Chips at all.  They were extremely bland.
